heroSection.h3: Unlimited movies, TV shows and more
heroSection.p2: Ready to watch? Enter your email to create or restart your membership.

tvSection.p: Watch on smart TVs, PlayStation, Xbox, Chromecast, Apple TV, Blu-ray players and more.

faq.question: What is Bingewatch?
answer: Bingewatch is a streaming service that offers a wide variety of award-winning TV shows, movies, anime, documentaries and more – on thousands of internet-connected devices.
You can watch as much as you want, whenever you want, without a single ad – all for one low monthly price. There's always something new to discover, and new TV shows and movies are added every week!

faq.question: What can I Bingewatch?
answer: Bingewatch has an extensive library of feature films, documentaries, TV shows, anime, award-winning Bingewatch originals, and more. Watch as much as you want, anytime you want.
